what: Get a positive affirmation for every RStudio session start
title: Start your RStudio Session with a Positive Affirmation
text: cheer package includes functions give someone else praise. can append session start message include positive affirmation every time modifying R profile. , first use following command locate open R profile. .Rprofile file, add following code. Now try restarting RStudio session. now see positive affirmation colored green! Feel free change like. want ideas include RStudio session start check blog post .
code: usethis::edit_r_profile() setHook("rstudio.sessionInit", function(newSession) {   # any code included here will be run at the start of each RStudio session   cat(cli::col_green(cheer::praise_me())) }, action = "append")
